title.narrative: Support to International Agriculture Research Centres to Reduce Hunger/Malnutrition among Poor People

description.narrative: This activity (Support to International Agriculture Research Centres to Reduce Hunger/Malnutrition among Poor People) is a component of Support to International Agriculture Research Centres that benefits Poor People reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £46,749,165. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural research. , with the following implementing partners: Centre for Agriculture and Bioscience International, CROPS FOR THE FUTURE, GLOBAL FORUM ON AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH, International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development, International Centre of Insect Physiology and Ecology, Switzerland - Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC), World Vegetable Center. The start date is 15-08-2011 and the end date is 30-08-2016.

participating-org.narrative: Centre for Agriculture and Bioscience International
International Centre for Integrated Mountain Development
International Centre of Insect Physiology and Ecology
Switzerland - Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
